title: Beautiful 2
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100707im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0e2cf0ccdf03c833097f6c0bf3268db4_5870.jpg)

Hi !

Please could help to identify this fonts ?  
Thx a lot !

Font: 

 F37 Bella 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100707/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")
author: Emmanuel Bentahar

comments.content:
Resembles a number of common heavyweight hairline Didot/Bodoni style fonts, with the main distinctive features being the top stokes on 5 and 7 and the ball terminal on the S. Is this new or something from decades ago?  
Image seems to describe something Italian. For the time being here is an Italian Didone with a ball terminal on an alternate S.  
Don

Thx Don.  
It's a very beautiful graphic print of 2013. I love this type.  
You think it's a alternate font ? It's a kind of Didot for sure

thx again

This might be it: Bella from Face37 [http://www.creative-inspiration.co.uk./?p=39942](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100707/http:/www.creative-inspiration.co.uk/?p=39942 "http://www.creative-inspiration.co.uk./?p=39942")  
 [http://www.hypefortype.com/f37bella.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100707/http:/www.hypefortype.com/f37bella.html "http://www.hypefortype.com/f37bella.html")  
Don

I think i find it !

thx for your suggestion Don
